scripts.prepare-dist: cp package.json ./dist && cd ./dist && npm i --only prod && cd ..
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && npm run prepare-dist
scripts.deploy: npm run aws-package && npm run aws-deploy && rm -rf template-export.yml
scripts.aws-package: aws cloudformation package --template template.yml --s3-bucket deployments.tictacgo.xyz --s3-prefix socket --output-template template-export.yml
scripts.aws-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template-export.yml --stack-name ttg-socket --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
